spec_data.Name: sazanami-fonts-common
spec_data.Description:
The Sazanami type faces are automatically generated from Wadalab font kit.
They also contains some embedded Japanese bitmap fonts.

This package consists of files used by other sazanami-fonts packages.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 05:42:15 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Common files for Sazanami Japanese TrueType fonts
